text: What type of projects can I do in MEAN (Angular JS) for developing a good understanding in the language?

description.text:
I have gone through multiple video tutorials on YouTube for MEAN, I have got enough theoretical knowledge but not able to decide what type of project will be good for me to develop a good and practical understanding in this language.

can you guys please help me with deciding this?

Thanks in advance.

comments.text: Stack Overflow isn't place for such type of questions. But MEAN can be used for many different projects, do a search of web apps built using this stack and try to make simply replica of it.
just start one by one, read my answer first learn angularjs from official documentation tutorial , there they have a full application, it'll cover everthing from angularjs
